extensionDescription.message: Relieve your eyes by dimming a website that is too bright with Don't Burn My Eyes.

extensionName.description: Extension name. Do not translate this.

off.description: Label of the screen dimmer switch-off button.

on.description: Label of the screen dimmer switch-on button

websiteNotSupported.description: Message indicating that the website is not supported.

addToBlackList.description: Label of the blacklist add button.

removeFromBlackList.description: Label of the blacklist remove button.

addToWhiteList.description: Label of the whitelist add button.

removeFromWhiteList.description: Label of the whitelist remove button.

settings.description: Label of the settings open button tooltip and settings page header.

openSettingsAriaLabel.description: Aria label of the settings open button.

enableScreenDimmer.description: Label of the screen dimmer switch.

operatingMode.description: Label of the operating mode select.

blackList.description: Label of the blacklist operating mode. Used in operating mode select and URLs config tab.

whiteList.description: Label of the whitelist operating mode. Used in operating mode select and URLs config tab.

alwaysOn.description: Label of the always on operating mode. Used in operating mode select.

blacklistMessage.description: Message explaining how the blacklist mode works.
blacklistMessage.message: Screen dimmer will be applied everywhere except the URLs specified in the URLs config / Blacklist section.

blacklistMessageHighlight1.description: First highlight in the blacklist message. It has to be substring of blacklist message. Letter size does matter.

blacklistMessageHighlight2.description: Second highlight in the blacklist message. It has to be substring of blacklist message. Letter size does matter.

whitelistMessage.description: Message explaining how the whitelist mode works.
whitelistMessage.message: Screen dimmer will be applied only on URLs specified in the URLs config / Whitelist section.

whitelistMessageHighlight1.description: First highlight in the whitelist message. It has to be substring of whitelist message. Letter size does matter.

whitelistMessageHighlight2.description: Second highlight in the whitelist message. It has to be substring of whitelist message. Letter size does matter.

alwaysOnMessage.description: Message explaining how the always on mode works.
alwaysOnMessage.message: Screen dimmer will be applied everywhere.

alwaysOnMessageHighlight.description: Highlight in the whitelist message. It has to be substring of always on message. Letter size does matter.

urlsConfig.description: Label of the URLs config section

noUrlsToDisplay.description: Label of the no URLs to display header
noUrlsToDisplay.message: No URL has been added yet.

addUrlInPopup.description: Label of the no URLs to display message
addUrlInPopup.message: You can add the url in the pop-up menu.

searchUrl.description: Placeholder of the search URL input.

cleanSearchUrlInputAriaLabel.description: Aria label of clean search URL input button.

travoltaMemeAlt.description: Alternate text of the travolta image.

removeUrlAriaLabel.description: Aria label of remove URL button.

thankYou.description: This is not used anywhere. Thanks for translation. Leave message bellow if you want :)
